name: Rubix Timer
description:
Record your times when solving your Rubiks Cube.😌😏

Rubix Timer uses the proximity sensor on the iPhone or you can manually click the screen to start your time.

Instructions
------------------
1 - Put your hand over the iPhone
2 - As soon as you lift your hand it will start your time
3 - Once you solved the Rubiks Cube you just have to put your hands on top of the iPhone to stop the Timer.

Rubix Timer includes:-
1 - Your best time
2 - Average time
3 - Lowest time

Enjoy and share with the world how good you are.
Enjoy
